author: mcpierce
msg: NO-JIRA: Added incoming/outgoing window support to the Ruby bindings.
Added the incoming_window=, incoming_window, outgoing_window= and
outgoing_window methods to Qpid::Proton::Messenger. Added rspec tests to
verify the methods as working properly.

author: mcpierce
msg: NO-JIRA: Provides support for subscriptions to the Ruby language bindings.
Added the new type, Qpid::Proton::Subscription, which encapsulates the
subscription value returned by the underlying C code.

author: mcpierce
msg: NO-JIRA: Added support for tracking messages to the Ruby bindings.
Created the Qpid::Proton::Tracker type, which is now returned by the new
Adds the ability to accept and reject trackers to the Ruby bindings.
